Waterproofing ITP
Specifications & Safety
Current manufacturer's product Specification and materials confirmed (RLA, Sika)
Verification of Preceding Works
Confirm substrate is clean and empty from any coating, sharp edges, rough concrete, oils, grease, spray marks and any other materials that will impact adhesion
Confirm base substrate is dry, clean, and smooth surfaces for application of membrane. Moisture content to meet the manufacturer’s recommendation and the material data sheet.

Confirm substrate details are as per drawing and specifications. i.e., falls to drains, flashing rebates, hobs, angles have been constructed properly to enable membrane systems to work as per manufacturer's specifications.
Hobs
Confirm substrate is clean and empty from any coating, sharp edges, rough concrete, oils, grease, spray marks and any other materials that will impact adhesion
Confirm base substrate is dry, clean, and smooth surfaces for application of membrane. Moisture content to meet the manufacturer’s recommendation and the material data sheet.

Confirm substrate details are as per drawing and specifications. i.e., falls to drains, flashing rebates, hobs, angles have been constructed properly to enable membrane systems to work as per manufacturer's specifications.
Checked Moisture content in concrete before waterproofing
Confirm application of two-part water-based (Moisture Seal Primer) to the floors.
Confirm application of 1st coat of RLA PU850 (oil base) to the floors
Confirm application of 2nd coat of RLA PU850 (oil base) to the floors
Membrane application as per manufacturer specifications and Australian Standards
Confirm membrane thickness is minimum 1000 microns
Bathrooms & Laundries
Confirm all joints are cleaned and sealed with coving/fillet between floor and wall junctions. Joints widths for sealing no more than 5mm
Checked Moisture content in concrete before waterproofing
Water stops (3mm) supply/install laser square as specified
Confirm application of two-part water-based (Moisture Seal Primer) to the floors.
Confirm application of primer (Uniprime) to the walls.
Confirm application of 1st coat & 2nd coat of RLA PU850 (oil base) to the floors
Confirm application of 1st coat & 2nd coat of RLA WPM (water base) to the walls.
Flood tested for 24 hours
Membrane application as per manufacturer specifications and Australian Standards

Confirm membrane wall upturns are maximum 150mm and 100mm above FFL (floor finish level)
Confirm falls to drainage outlets in floor substrate 1:100 minimum
Checked Moisture content in concrete before waterproofing
Confirm application of two-part water-based (Moisture Seal Primer). Primer must be completely dry prior to application of sealant and membrane.
Confirm application of bond breaker single component (Sikaflex)
Confirm application of 1st coat & 2nd coat of RLA PU850 (oil base)
Membrane application as per manufacturer specifications and Australian Standards
Confirm application of Sikaflex to the sides.
Flood tested for 24 hours
Confirm edge to drip groove with the application of Moisture seal and 2 Part Cementitious
Confirm sand cement screed Waterproof on top of sand & cement with Moisture seal and 2 Part Cementitious
